price: Sa'an nan kuma kuka jũya daga bayan wancan, to, bã dõmin falalar Allah ba da rahamarSa a kanku, haƙĩƙa, dã kun kasance daga mãsu hasãra."
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَۖ فَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ لَكُنتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaytum min baʿdi dhālika falawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu lakuntum mina al-khāsirīna
